amendment.description: To establish a procedure for terminating a determination by Surgeon General to suspend certain entries and imports from designated places.

action.text: Amendment SA 5480 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 5480 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 295.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313 (b)(1)(A) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5480.

Amendment SA 5480 proposed by Senator Tester to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4179-4180; text: CR S4179) To establish a procedure for terminating a determination by Surgeon General to suspend certain entries and imports from designated places.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5480 proposed by Senator Tester to Amendment SA 5194.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 5480 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 44. Record Vote Number: 295.
